data.title: Grapefruit League 2024: Cheapest Yankees, Mets spring training tickets
data.meta_description: We found the best prices on 2024 Grapefruit League Spring Training tickets for the Braves, Orioles, Red Sox, Tigers, Astros, Marlins, Twins, Mets, Yankees, Phillies, Pirates, Cardinals, Rays, Blue Jays, Nationals.
data.text:
Before you know it, Opening Day 2024 will be here.

In the meantime, 15 Major League Baseball teams are gearing up all over Florida as part of the annual spring training Grapefruit League.

For New Yorkers, you can catch your hometown Yankees and Mets in the Sunshine State’s warm climes from now up until late March.

Other major clubs playing ball down south this next month include the always competitive Atlanta Braves, Philadelphia Phillies and Houston Astros.

Best of all, you can see all your favorite teams — including the ones listed above — for next to nothing this next month.

Based on our findings, some tickets are going for as low as $4 before fees on Vivid Seats.

That’s less than it will cost you to buy a burger at the ballpark.

Want to see Juan Soto, Pete Alonso, Justin Verlander, Bryce Harper, Ronald Acuña Jr. and more for cheap?

We’ve got everything you need to know and more about the 2024 Grapefruit League below.

All prices listed above are subject to fluctuation.

Grapefruit League 2024 ticket prices

A complete list of all teams, their home ballparks and the cheapest tickets available to see them can be found here:

(Note: The New York Post confirmed all above prices at the publication time. All prices are in US dollars, subject to fluctuation and include additional fees at checkout.)

Vivid Seats is a verified secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

They offer a 100% buyer guarantee that states your transaction will be safe and secure and your tickets will be delivered prior to the event.

Huge concerts in Florida

If you’re looking for a show on top of a game, we’ve got you covered.

Here are just five exciting concerts in Florida this March that you won’t want to miss.

• Rib Round Up feat. Lainey Wilson, Nate Smith, Warren Zeiders (March 2)

• Bob Dylan (March 5-6)

• Marc Anthony (March 7)

• Lynyrd Skynyrd and ZZ Top (March 9)

• Fall Out Boy with Jimmy Eat World (March 16)
